Metric: (1) Total energy consumed
Context: “Total energy consumption: 996 million kWh. Includes electricity, natural gas, diesel and gasoline used in buildings, leased vehicles and company-owned aircraft.”

Metric: (2) percentage grid electricity
Context: “Electricity purchased from grid: 882 million kWh; On-site renewable electricity: 5.24 million kWh.”

Metric: (3) percentage renewable
Context: “We sourced 61.5% of our electricity from renewable sources across all Dell facilities.”

Metric: Description of policies and practices relating to targeted advertising and customer privacy
Context:
Dell Technologies is committed to respecting and protecting the privacy of our customers, team members and partners. Our Global Privacy Program is based on globally recognized privacy principles and frameworks, including the OECD Guidelines, the APEC Privacy Framework and the Fair Information Practices.

We continue to enhance our Privacy Center to make it easier and faster for customers to exercise choice and control over their personal data. In FY24, the Privacy Center became available in 74 locations globally.

Metric: Number of customers whose information is used for secondary purposes
Total amount of monetary losses as a result of legal proceedings associated with customer privacy

(3) percentage resulting in disclosure
(1) Number of data breaches
(2) percentage that are personal data breaches
(3) number of customers affected
